name: CSU East Bay VITA
description: Free virtual tax prep via Zoom for income $84,000 or less
fullDescription: CSU East Bay's accounting students provide free virtual tax preparation through the VITA program for taxpayers earning $84,000 or less.
whatTheyOffer:
- Free virtual tax preparation via Zoom
- Available for income up to $84,000
- Federal and state tax returns
- IRS-certified student preparers supervised by faculty
- Convenient online service
howToGetIt:
1. Visit the CSU East Bay VITA website
2. Schedule an appointment online
3. Gather and scan/photograph your tax documents
4. Attend your Zoom appointment
5. Review and sign your return electronically
keywords: CSU East Bay, VITA, virtual tax preparation, Zoom tax help, free tax filing, student preparers, Hayward, Alameda County
